Articles.Content:
Also I can upload the .craft for my LAV if anybody wants it.

Id like that.
it would be cool that you add a sound to the weapon.
can someone send me a link to patch an older version of this mod for 0.20.2 (I mostly play on the older versions.)

Id like that.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/56xhvloj4tbeo16/gYHsHpCbtU

There you go. It requires DR for the turret, door, etc and KW Rocketry's heavy and medium struts. (sorry but it falls apart with stock struts)

I don't know if this is my own problem. Because I saw couple of video in internet which works flawlessly.

At first the gun was not apeared in part list. Then i checked part.cfg and found "category = 0", after it is changed into "category = Science", i am now able to set up the gun and fire it.

The problem is that it causes huge lag every time I shoot, after kept pressing the fire key, game will just crush.

Does anyone experience the same as me?

Hey DYJ could you do a podded machine gun? Like this:

That would be cool!
This would be amazing if it required ammo of some manner.

can someone send me a link to patch an older version of this mod for 0.20.2 (I mostly play on the older versions.)

I'm the same way, I find the new SAS system to not work well and i have more mods on .20. After a quick test (after 10 min loading time ), i found that it works in .20 just fine as it is .

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/56xhvloj4tbeo16/gYHsHpCbtU

There you go. It requires DR for the turret, door, etc and KW Rocketry's heavy and medium struts. (sorry but it falls apart with stock struts)

DR deletes everything (including stock parts) when installed on .21, or at least on mine. Do you have a similar LAV that doesn't use DR? It would be very much appreciated.

DR deletes everything (including stock parts) when installed on .21, or at least on mine. Do you have a similar LAV that doesn't use DR? It would be very much appreciated.

There is a fix for this. The instructions for this can be found at the bottom of this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/37707-0-21-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Parts-Infernal-Robotics
it not working fo me what so ever......help...

it not working fo me what so ever......help...

You are going to need to be more specific when asking for help - forum users cannot read minds, and certainly not across the internet.

What version of KSP are you using? How did you install the mod? Which key did you assign the fire button to?

You are going to need to be more specific when asking for help - forum users cannot read minds, and certainly not across the internet.

Which key did you bind it to?

There is a fix for this. The instructions for this can be found at the bottom of this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/37707-0-21-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Parts-Infernal-Robotics
